Arrangement.text:
Chorus 1: [A]Oh how he loves us, [B7/F#]so Oh how he [Esus]loves us How He loves us [D2] so [A]Oh how he loves [D/F#]us, so oh how he lo[E]ves us How He loves us [D] so [A D2/F# Esus Dmaj7]
Chorus 2: He l[A]oves us, oh how he [D2/F#]loves us Oh how He lo[E]ves us, oh how He lo[D2]ves Yeah He l[A]oves us, oh how He [D/F#]loves us Oh how He lo[E]ves us, oh how He lo[D2]ves
Arrangement.searchtext: chorus 1 oh how he loves us so oh how he loves us how he loves us so oh how he loves us so oh how he loves us how he loves us so chorus 2 he loves us oh how he loves us oh how he loves us oh how he loves yeah he loves us oh how he loves us oh how he loves us oh how he loves
